pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.3: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:2.1.6: agārikassa yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā pacati, sāṭakaṃ vā veṭhanaṃ vā dhovati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:2.2.5: attano veyyāvaccakarassa yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā pacati, sāṭakaṃ vā veṭhanaṃ vā dhovati,
